titles.title: O, When The Saints Go Marching In

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O, when the saints go marching in,
O, when the saints go marching in,
Lord, I want to be in that number,
When the saints go marching in.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And when the sun begins to shine,
And when the sun begins to shine,
Lord, I want to be in that number,
When the saints go marching in.
